name: The Last Laugh (TheDoctor989)
description:
This game is inspired by the popular creepy videos on YouTube, Known only as the "Trollge".

Plot:

"The Tragedy that befell the small lakeside community shocked and horrified the neighbor early this week, What many people described as "a sick and horrible act" was committed in that house. The Father, who now is in custody pleads insanity and insists that the voices in the walls ordered him to do it. He is being charged with 1st degree murder and will be receiving the death sentence as punishment for this heinous act."
